message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $105 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
Considering your last offer, I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108.
Given your latest offer, I would like to counter with an offer of $106 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close, but I still need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $109.
Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product.
